title: Mind's Powerful Wagtail CMS Intranet | Torchbox Case Study

metadata.description: Mind has improved knowledge sharing, networking and collaboration across its federated network of 100+ independent local Minds with the launch of a powerful new intranet built on Wagtail CMS.
